# GitHub Actions workflow for building ACB Link Desktop
# Builds Windows and macOS installers on release

name: Build and Release

on:
  push:
    tags:
      - 'v*'
  workflow_dispatch:
    inputs:
      version:
        description: 'Version to build (e.g., 2.0.0)'
        required: true
        default: '2.0.0'

jobs:
  build-windows:
    runs-on: windows-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'
          cache: 'pip'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r requirements.txt
          pip install pyinstaller accessible_output2
          
      - name: Get version
        id: version
        shell: bash
        run: |
          if [ "${{ github.event_name }}" = "workflow_dispatch" ]; then
            echo "VERSION=${{ github.event.inputs.version }}" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          else
            echo "VERSION=${GITHUB_REF#refs/tags/v}" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          fi
          
      - name: Build executable
        run: |
          pyinstaller acb_link.spec
          
      - name: Create portable ZIP
        run: |
          Compress-Archive -Path dist\ACBLink\* -DestinationPath "dist\ACBLink-${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}-Windows-Portable.zip"
          
      - name: Install NSIS
        run: |
          choco install nsis -y
          
      - name: Build installer
        run: |
          # Update version in NSI
          (Get-Content installer\acb_link.nsi) -replace '!define VERSION ".*"', '!define VERSION "${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}"' | Set-Content installer\acb_link.nsi
          & "C:\Program Files (x86)\NSIS\makensis.exe" installer\acb_link.nsi
          Move-Item installer\ACBLink-*-Setup.exe dist\
          
      - name: Generate checksums
        run: |
          cd dist
          Get-FileHash *.exe,*.zip -Algorithm SHA256 | ForEach-Object { "$($_.Hash) $($_.Path.Split('\')[-1])" } > checksums-windows.txt
          
      - name: Upload artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: windows-build
          path: |
            dist/*.exe
            dist/*.zip
            dist/checksums-windows.txt
          retention-days: 5

  build-macos:
    runs-on: macos-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        
      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'
          cache: 'pip'
          
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r requirements.txt
          pip install pyinstaller py2app
          brew install create-dmg
          
      - name: Get version
        id: version
        run: |
          if [ "${{ github.event_name }}" = "workflow_dispatch" ]; then
            echo "VERSION=${{ github.event.inputs.version }}" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          else
            echo "VERSION=${GITHUB_REF#refs/tags/v}" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          fi
          
      - name: Build app bundle
        run: |
          chmod +x scripts/build_macos.sh
          ./scripts/build_macos.sh ${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}
          
      - name: Generate checksums
        run: |
          cd dist
          shasum -a 256 *.dmg > checksums-macos.txt
          
      - name: Upload artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: macos-build
          path: |
            dist/*.dmg
            dist/checksums-macos.txt
          retention-days: 5

  create-release:
    needs: [build-windows, build-macos]
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    if: startsWith(github.ref, 'refs/tags/')
    
    permissions:
      contents: write
      
    steps:
      - name: Download Windows artifacts
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: windows-build
          path: artifacts/
          
      - name: Download macOS artifacts
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: macos-build
          path: artifacts/
          
      - name: Create combined checksums
        run: |
          cd artifacts
          cat checksums-windows.txt checksums-macos.txt > checksums.txt
          rm checksums-windows.txt checksums-macos.txt
          
      - name: Get version
        id: version
        run: echo "VERSION=${GITHUB_REF#refs/tags/v}" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
        
      - name: Create Release
        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v1
        with:
          name: ACB Link Desktop v${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}
          draft: true
          prerelease: ${{ contains(github.ref, 'beta') || contains(github.ref, 'alpha') }}
          generate_release_notes: true
          files: |
            artifacts/*
          body: |
            ## ACB Link Desktop v${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}
            
            ### Downloads
            
            **Windows:**
            - `ACBLink-${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}-Setup.exe` - Installer (recommended)
            - `ACBLink-${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}-Windows-Portable.zip` - Portable version
            
            **macOS:**
            - `ACBLink-${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}-macOS.dmg` - macOS installer
            
            ### Checksums
            
            See `checksums.txt` for SHA256 verification hashes.
            
            ### Installation
            
            See [Installation Guide](https://github.com/acbnational/acb_link_desktop/blob/main/docs/INSTALLATION.md) for detailed instructions.
            
            ### Accessibility
            
            This release maintains full WCAG 2.2 AA compliance with support for:
            - NVDA, JAWS, and Narrator (Windows)
            - VoiceOver (macOS)
            
            ### What's Changed
            
            <!-- Release notes will be auto-generated -->
